title: Flutter Developer, Flutter App Developer, Android Mobile App Developer
tagsAndSkills: Flutter,Flutter Development,Mobile Application Development,Android Application Development,Mobile Development,wireframe,iOS,Application
jobDescription:
Responsibilities:

Develop high-quality mobile applications using Flutter framework for both iOS and Android platforms.
Collaborate with product management and design teams to translate requirements and wireframes into functional apps.
Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code following best practices and coding standards.
Implement UI/UX designs and animations to create intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces.
Integrate third-party libraries and APIs to enhance app functionality.
Conduct unit tests, troubleshoot issues, and ensure app performance and stability.
Work closely with backend developers to integrate mobile apps with server-side systems.
Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.
Stay updated on Flutter and mobile app development trends, tools, and techniques.
Participate in code reviews, sprint planning, and team meetings to ensure project alignment and progress.

Develop mobile applications using Flutter/Android. Ensure app performance and usability. Collaborate with teams for app development.

title: Front End Developer (Angular/Ionic)
jobDescription:
• You will be working alongside other engineers and developers working on different layers of the infrastructure.
  • Therefore, a commitment to collaborative problem-solving, sophisticated design, and the creation of quality products is essential.

Technical Knowledge and Skills:

  • Strong architectural knowledge of Front-end technologies languages
  • Good working understanding and experience with best practices in mobile app development.

  • Write well-designed, testable, efficient code by using the best software development practices.

  • Must have strong experie nce in Cordova, Capacitor

  • Hands-on experience on web technologies (HTML 5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Canvas HTML, JavaScript, JSON, jQuery and Angular, Type script)

  • Candidate Should be able to convert HTML App templates (XD/Figma) into Ionic.

  • Mobile/Web application development experience using JavaScript frameworks.
  • Experience with RESTful Web services.
  • 2 years of experience with Angular 9+ and Ionic 5/6.
  • Experience with PWAs, Android & iOS building is a plus.
  • Should have basic knowledge of Android and iOS UI elements and their User Experience Flows.
  • Good knowledge of Code Debugging and Troubleshooting
  • Experience using unit testing frameworks
  • Knowledge of Test Driven Development (Unit Testing)
  • Knowledge of Behaviour Driven Development (UI Testing)
  • Experience using E2E test frameworks and runners
  • Good Experience in Git and Merge/Pull Request handling
Expectations :

  • Ability to work independently with no supervision and with multiple checkpoints with the team

  • App building automation using shell scripts.

  • Creative thinking and ability to fill the gaps

  • Challenge practices and establish new patterns

  • Ability to work on and expand upon homegrown frameworks

  • Ability to formulate actionable problem statements

  • Follow guidelines and proactively highlight functional and technical gaps
